name: Kinfire Chronicles
storyline: You and your team take on the roles of Seekers, a group of adventurers fighting to protect the city of Din'Lux from a world-altering phenomenon called The Darkness. The choices you make affect everything from the route you take, to the way you level up, to the very fate of Atios itself.
summary: Kinfire Chronicles is a cooperative, quest-based RPG board game set in a brand-new fantasy universe.
